html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04632020-06-17,  ,  PSPC,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Lands Company Limited ** Leases **
PrecisOrder Authorizing (1) the OLD PORT OF MONTREAL CORPORATION INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 60 LEASES in 2020-21, having individual values of up to 800,000 per year, and a total value of up to $10,000,000 , and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2010-21 to 2024-24 Corporate plan, and (2) PARC DOWSVIEW PARK INC. to ENTER INTO UP TO 20 LEASES in 2020-21, having individual values of up to 1,400,00 per year, and a total value of up to $12,000,000, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the 2020-21 to 2024-25 Corporate Plan.
AttachmentsAttachment
